header.subtitle: Most popular among drivers in PA
Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 215-55r17 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 215/55R17 Tire Size Currently, 215/55R17 is one of the five most popular tire sizes in the United States, and that’s largely driven by the fact that the size is commonly used on smaller CUVs like the Hyundai Kona and larger sedans like the Toyota Camry. If you drive a Nissan Altima, Volkswagen Passat, Lexus ES350, or Honda HR-V, then 215/55R17 is likely your tire size. More often than not a driver whose tire size is 215/55R17 will use all-season tires, and might even roll out of the factory with a set of Michelin Primacy MXM4, [Pirelli P Zero All Season](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/p-zero-all-season), Continental ProContact TX, or Falken Sincera SN250 A A/S tires attached. Popular vehicles: 1. 2018-2022 Hyundai Kona
2. 2016-2021 Honda HR-V
3. 2005-2021 Toyota Camry
4. 2002-2021 Nissan Altima
5. 2012-2021 Volkswagen Passat
6. 2007-2021 Lexus ES350
7. 2011-2020 Kia Optima If you’re looking for a new set of all-season tires that aren’t original equipment, check out the [Bridgestone Ecopia EP422 Plus](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/ecopia-ep422-plus), Kumho Solus TA31, Nitto Motivo, or Pirelli Cinturato P7 All Season Plus 2. Each tire offers drivers good traction and performance in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Do you live in an area that deals with heavy snow and ice in the winter months? If that’s the case, check out winter tires like the Nokian Nordman 7, Hankook Winter i cept iZ2 (W616), General Altimax Arctic 12, or [Yokohama iceGuard iG53](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/iceguard-ig53) for strong traction and performance in ice and snow. Maybe you want one set of tires that provides strong traction in dry and wet conditions but is better in winter weather than an all-season tire. All-weather tires blend the best of all-season and winter tires, so check out the Michelin CrossClimate 2 A/W, [General Altimax 365AW](https://simpletire.com/brands/general-tires/altimax-365aw), Firestone Weathergrip, or Toyo Celsius for true year-round traction and performance. Whether you drive a Toyota Camry, Nissan Altima, Kia Optima, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 215/55R17 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
